attributes.action: Compel foreign drivers whose vehicles are found to be faulty to have them made safe before proceeding on their journey - on penalty of impounding the vehicle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Defective foreign vehicle, particularly lorries, present a serious danger to road safety.  More rigorous inspection facilities should be provided at ports and stiff fines levied sufficient to pay for the inspection service.  Failure to pay to have the vehicle made safe and to pay the fine should result in impounding the vehicle.
